VSL PARTICULAR:
MV QING QUAN SHAN
2015 BLT HONGKONG FLAG
DWT 63472.7MTS ON 13.30M - SUMMER– TPC 62.4
LOA:199.90M / BEAM:32.26M
INT'L TONNAGE: 36388GT /21647NT
HA/HO: 5/5
HOLDS ARE FITTED WITH CO2 DEVICES ,
TOTAL GRAIN CAPACITY:78642.4CBM
GEARS: 4 X 30 MTS CRANES
NUMBER OF GRABS: 4 X (6 - 12) CBM
TANK TOP STRENGTH HOLD NO.1.3.5/25T/CBM NO.2.4/20T/CBM
AT SEA: ABOUT 14 KNOTS (BALLAST) ON ABOUT 27 MT/DAY LSFO (380CST); ABOUT 13 KNOTS (LADEN) ON ABOUT 28 MT/DAY LSFO (380CST);
IN PORT (24HRS WORKING): ABOUT 6 MT/DAY LSFO (380CST)/DAY;
IN PORT (IDLE): ABOUT4 MT/DAY LSFO (380CST)/DAY.
OWNERS PROVIDE VSL'S ECONOMICAL SPEED/CONS AS BELOW UNDER WITHOUT GUARANTEE BSS, AND THE MASTER
ALWAYS HAS AN OPTION TO RUN AT FULL SPEED FOR ABOUT 2 HOURS ON DAILY BASIS
ECO23MT/13KN BALLAST  24MT/12.5KN LADEN WOG
FOR ECONOMIC REASONS CHARTERERS HAVE THE OPTION TO ORDER THE VESSEL TO PROCEED AT INCREASED OR REDUCED SPEED AT ANY TIME AND FOR ANY PERIOD OF TIME DURING THIS CHARTER PARTY. IF MASTER/CHIEF ENGINEERS FIND SUCH SPEED ADJUSTMENT WILL DAMAGE THE M/E, THE MASTER/CHIEF ENGINEER HAVE THEIR OWN DECISION TO RESUME SAILING AT CP SPEED/CONSUMPTION AT ANY TIME DURING THE PERIOD OF THIS C/P.
THE VESSEL TO HAVE THE LIBERTY OF USING LSMGO FOR EXCHANGING BALLAST WATER AT SEA,STARTING/STANDBY/STOPPING ENGINES, WHILE MANEUVERING IN SHALLOW/NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, IN/OUT OF PORTS AND DURING POOR VISIBILITY AND ALSO DURING MAINTENANCE WORKS, NARROW/CONFINED WATERS ETC. THE VESSEL WILL CONSUME ADDITIONAL VLSFO WHEN BALLASTING/DEBALLASTING/BALLAST EXCHANGING/HOLD CLEANNING ETC.
ALL ABOVE SPEED/CONSUMPTIONS ARE GIVEN UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITION AND CLEAN BOTTOM, SMOOTH SEA, WITH BEAUFORT SCALE MAX WIND FORCE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (THREE, I.E. THE SUM OF WAVE + SWELL HEIGHT UP TO 1.25 METERS),NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL. EXTRAPOLATION OF “GOOD WEATHER” PERFORMANCE FOR “BAD WEATHER” PERIODS IS NOT ALLOWED. POSITIVE CURRENT FACTOR ON SHIP'S FAVOR.
BUNKERS SPEC:
LSFO: IF380CST-RMG380-LS ISO8217-2017, SULPHUR CONTENT NOT MORE THAN 0.50%
MGO: MGO DMA ISO8217-2017
LSMGO: MGO-DMA-LS ISO8217-2017, SULPHUR CONTENT NOT MORE THAN 0.10%
CHARTERERS UNDER THIS CP WARRANT TO SUPPLY BUNKERS TO MEET MARPOL ANNEX VI LATEST REQUIREMENTS.
BUNKER ISO 8217-2010 TO BE ALLOWED IN CASE ISO 8217-2017 OR LATEST EDITION NOT AVAILABLE.IF ANY DISPUTE ABOUT BUNKER QUALITY, BUNKER SAMPLE TO BE INSPECTED AS PER ISO 8217-2017.
MIXING OF BUNKERS UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES ALLOWED.
BIMCO FUEL SULPHUR CONTENT CLAUSE AND BIMCO BUNKER QUALITY CONTROL CLAUSE FOR TIME CHARTER PARTIES AND BIMCO 2020 MARINE FUEL SULPHUR CONTENT CLAUSE FOR TIME CHARTER PARTIES TO APPLY.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT
BUNKER ON DELIVERY: ABT 800MT LSFO / ABT 140MT LSMGO
LAST FIVE CARGO: GYPSUM/PETCOKE/PIG IRON/ STEEL/MANGANESE ORE
LAST TEN PORTS: PORT EVERGLADES/ GIBRALTAR/ GARRUCHA/ NADOR/ GIBRALTAR/ JORF LASFAR/ PORT ARTHUR(US)/ BATON ROUGE/RIO DE JANEIRO/CONAKRY
